entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
